name: OCTA (lacmacfactac)
description:
Past you is the worst! Your mistakes accumulate,  and constantly dealing with your mess is what your life revolves around. It's the same with OCTA. All you want is to reach your aim (in this case the colourful tile on the other side of the board), but every red tile you leave around will become an obstacle the next round, bringing you closer to doom. You are truly your own enemy. Damn you past you!

Move around with WASD or arrows.
